mapper.select: SELECT ql.fUuid AS 'uuid', ql.fQZOperationTypeUuid AS 'qzOperationTypeUuid', ql.fCreateTime AS 'createTime', qt.fOperationtype AS 'operationType', ql.fActualChargeDate AS 'actualChargeDate', ql.fActualAmount AS 'actualAmount', ql.fUserID AS 'userID', us.fUserName AS 'userName' FROM t_qz_charge_log ql JOIN t_userinfo us ON ql.fUserID = us.fLoginName JOIN t_qz_operation_type qt ON qt.fUuid = ql.fQZOperationTypeUuid WHERE EXISTS( SELECT qt.fUuid FROM t_qz_operation_type qt WHERE qt.fQZSettingUuid = #{fQZSettingUuid} AND qt.fUuid = ql.fQZOperationTypeUuid ) ORDER BY ql.fCreateTime DESC
